text: læa brrda phu periybtheiyb phrrya khxng phwk khea wa semuxn mæ khxng phwk khea nan læw phwk khea ca khun su thxykha thi phwk khea di klaw wi dangnan (sing thi capen kæ khea txng ptibati khux) kar plxy thas hnung khn kxn thi khea thang sxng ca tæatxng tx kan (rwm hlab nxn) nan khux sing thi phwk cea thuk teuxn xea wi (chı hı ptibati) læa xallxhˌ thrng rxbru ying nı sing thi phwk cea kratha
